text: An la que yi yong leyuan huanqu xinshimen de shengming he caichan [zhu 1]. Tamen wei an la zhidao zhandou [zhu 2], tamen sha di he zhenwang. Zhe shi ta [an la] zai “tao la te”,“yin ji lei” he “gulanjing” zhong de zhenshi xunuo. Shei bi an la geng neng shixian ziji de nuoyan ne? Suoyi, nimen dang wei ziji [yu an la] suo zuo de jiaoyi er huanxi. Zhe que shi weida de chenggong.
